子午线轮胎（Radial tire）是由两层或三层钢丝环带交叉放置贴合于帘子布胎体上组合而成的。胎体帘子线从一边胎圈连接到另一边胎 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from medieval Latin radialis, from Latin radius (see radius)

entry.tran: 辐射状的；向各方向伸展的；放射状的
entry.def: Radial refers to the pattern that you get when straight lines are drawn from the centre of a circle to a number of points round the edge.

example.ex: The white marble floors were inlaid in a radial pattern of brass.
example.tran: 白色的大理石地板镶嵌在铜质的放射形图案中。

entry.def: A radial or a radial tyre is a tyre which is strengthened inside by cords that point towards the centre of the wheel. Radials are less likely to slide sideways on wet or icy roads than other tyres.

means.word_mean: 1. pneumatic tire that has radial-ply casing
1. relating to or near the radius;
2. relating to or moving along or having the direction of a radius;
3. issuing in rays from a common centerXs; relating to rays of light;
4. arranged like rays or radii; radiating from a common center;

sentences.sentence: "a starlike or stellate arrangement of petals"
"many cities show a radial pattern of main highways"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 发光的, 辐射的, 容光焕发的
stems_affixes.word_buile: radi辐射,光线+ant……的→adj.发光的, 辐射的, 容光焕发的
radi辐射,光线+o状态+active积极的, 能起作用的→adj.放射性的,有放射能的
rad=radi辐射,光线+ar器→n.雷达, 电波探测器
radi辐射,光线+al表名词→n.光线, 射线

stems_affixes.value_cn: 发散, 发光, 发热, 辐射, 放射, 放射线, 放射物
stems_affixes.word_buile: radiate[v.发光；放射，辐射；散布，传播]+ion表名词→n.发散, 发光, 发热, 辐射, 放射, 放射线, 放射物

stems_affixes.value_cn: 散热器, 水箱, 冷却器, 电暖炉, 辐射体
stems_affixes.word_buile: radiate[v.发光；放射，辐射；散布，传播]+or物器→radiator散热器, 水箱, 冷却器, 电暖炉, 辐射体
radi辐射,光线+o物→收音机，无线电
radi辐射,光线+o状态+activity活动→n.放射性，放射现象
radi辐射,光线+um→镭是一种高度放射性的金属元素
